analysis.key_quote: the OPM has repeatedly shown itself to incapable of adding real value to governmental operations (and in fact, has factually shown to DECREASE the efficiency of government operations)
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses skepticism about the effectiveness of the OPM and suggests that the focus should be on funding and improving existing systems rather than reclassifying employees, indicating a preference for maintaining current merit-based protections and opposing potential politicization.
